data.text:
@EU_Commission The number of human rights abuses in Uganda can no longer be ignored.
Innocent citizens are kidnapped, tortured & most go missing never to be found!
Even journalists are suffocated to report the truth.
#Article3UG
#RiseupUg
#WeAreRemovingADictator
#UgandaIsBleeding
@POTUS @VP
@EU_Commission #uganda bleeding stop keeping silent when you're ambassador in Uganda  dictator museveni continue keeping toturing , murdering and killing Ugandans , Ugandans lives matter

@EU_Commission The number of human rights abuses in Uganda can no longer be ignored.

@POTUS @VP

@EU_Commission The Western World should stop funding & collaborating with the illegit gov't of Museveni, which lost the election to @HEBobiwine
Shreds of evidence; are the political prisoners in jails & continued kidnapping of opposition supporters.
#Article3UG
#RiseupUg
#WeAreRemovingADictator

@EU_Commission This time around dictator museveni is now naked  due to what happened in kayunga bi election this reflects 14th January 2021
#riseupug
#UgandaIsBleeding 
#dna
#FreeAllPoliticalPrisoners

@EU_Commission With all the influence you've across the world, you've failed to condemn the atrocities & crimes against humanity done by @KagutaMuseveni on Ugandans!
WHERE'S YOUR JUSTICE?
#RiseUpUg 
#Article3UG 
#UgandaIsBleeding 
#WeAreRemovingADictator
#FreeAllPoliticalPrisonersinUganda
@hrw

@EU_Commission #Ugandans strongly want to see @KagutaMuseveni in the dock too, for his atrocities against humanity since 1960s.
He must be brought to book for murdering, imprisoning, poisoning & torturing decent Ugandans.
#RiseUpUg 
#Article3UG 
#WeAreRemovingADictator
#UgandaIsBleeding

@EU_Commission we hope you do that despite the economic crisis the multitude of problems, in the east the latest Russian aggression, Poland, Hungary Balkans, Turkey especially Africa. The EU must play the role it deserves in Africa politically and economically.
